generated_body: As you read the article titled "Thanksgiving air travel expected to set a record, TSA says," you may expect it to provide insights into the anticipated surge in air travel during the Thanksgiving holiday period. Additionally, it may discuss potential factors contributing to this increase, such as easing travel restrictions and rising consumer confidence.
